    [5] = {
        name = "Feli",
        description = "Feli is easily identified by its massive and deep crater. Outside of the crater, the arkship geological survey reports a fairly bland and uniform planet, it also cannot explain the existence of the crater. unit.hide()

local panelName = "Altitude info" --export: panel name
showClosestPlanet = true --export: show closest planet
showHasAtmosphere = true --export: show if the planet has an atmosphere
showAtmoHeight = true --export: show the atmosphere height
showAvgSurfaceHeight = true --export: show the average altitude

-- panel setup
panelid = system.createWidgetPanel(panelName)

if showClosestPlanet == true then
    -- closesd planet
    widgetClosedPlanetId = system.createWidget(panelid, "value")
    planetInfoData = {
        value = "XYZ", 
        unit = "", 
        label = "Closest planet"
    }

    planetInfoDataId = system.createData(json.encode(planetInfoData))
    system.addDataToWidget(planetInfoDataId, widgetClosedPlanetId)
end

if showHasAtmosphere == true then
    -- hasAtmosphere
    hasAtmosphereId = system.createWidget(panelid, "value")
    hasAtmosphereData = {
        value = "yes", 
        unit = "", 
        label = "Atmosphere"
    }

    hasAtmosphereDataId = system.createData(json.encode(hasAtmosphereData))
    system.addDataToWidget(hasAtmosphereDataId, hasAtmosphereId)
end

if showAtmoHeight == true then
    -- noAtmosphericDensityAltitude
    widAtmoHeigthId = system.createWidget(panelid, "value")
    atmoHeigthData = {
        value = "0", 
        unit = "m", 
        label = "Atmo height"
    }

    atmoHeigthDataId = system.createData(json.encode(atmoHeigthData))
    system.addDataToWidget(atmoHeigthDataId, widAtmoHeigthId)
end

if showAvgSurfaceHeight == true then
    -- surfaceAverageAltitude
    surfaceAvgAltitudeId = system.createWidget(panelid, "value")
    surfaceAvgAltitudeData = {
        value = "0", 
        unit = "m", 
        label = "Avg surface height"
    }

    surfaceAvgAltitudeDataId = system.createData(json.encode(surfaceAvgAltitudeData))
    system.addDataToWidget(surfaceAvgAltitudeDataId, surfaceAvgAltitudeId)
end

unit.setTimer("updateInfo", 1)

location = vec3(core.getConstructWorldPos())

sortestDistance = nil;
sortestKeyId = nil;

for obj in pairs(_stellarObjects) do
    planetCenter = vec3(_stellarObjects[obj].center)
    distance = vec3(location - planetCenter):len() 
    
    if (sortestDistance == nil or distance < sortestDistance) and _stellarObjects[obj].size ~= nil then
        sortestDistance = distance;
        sortestKeyId = obj;
    end
end

if showClosestPlanet == true then
    planetInfoData.value = _stellarObjects[sortestKeyId].name
    system.updateData(planetInfoDataId, json.encode(planetInfoData))
end

if showAtmoHeight == true then
    atmoHeigthData.value = _stellarObjects[sortestKeyId].noAtmosphericDensityAltitude
    system.updateData(atmoHeigthDataId, json.encode(atmoHeigthData))
end

if showAvgSurfaceHeight == true then
    surfaceAvgAltitudeData.value = _stellarObjects[sortestKeyId].surfaceAverageAltitude
    system.updateData(surfaceAvgAltitudeDataId, json.encode(surfaceAvgAltitudeData))
end

if showHasAtmosphere == true then
    hasAtmosphereData.value = "No"
    if _stellarObjects[sortestKeyId].hasAtmosphere == True then 
        hasAtmosphereData.value = "Yes"
    end

    system.updateData(hasAtmosphereDataId, json.encode(hasAtmosphereData))
end
